          <title>
            <string language="sl">Spremenjen Atwoodov stroj</string>
            <string language="en">A modified Atwood's machine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maschine eines geänderten Atwoods</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La machine d'un Atwood modifié</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Máquina de um Atwood modificado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Macchina del Atwood modificato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μηχανή ενός τροποποιημένου Atwood</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Máquina de un Atwood modificado</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Voziček vlečemo po ravni podlagi s pomočjo uteži preko škripca.</string>
            <string language="en">A cart is pulled over the flat surface with the use of weight attached to the cart over a pulley.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">potencialna energija</string>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">energija</string>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Karre wird über die flache Oberfläche mit 
dem Gebrauch von Gewicht angebracht zur Karre über einer 
Riemenscheibe gezogen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un chariot est tiré au-dessus de la surface 
plate avec l'utilisation du poids fixée au chariot au-dessus d'une 
poulie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um carro é puxado sobre a superfície plana com 
o uso do peso unido ao carro sobre uma polia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un carrello è tirato sopra la superficie piana 
con l'uso di peso fissato al carrello sopra una puleggia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κάρρο τραβιέται πέρα από την επίπεδη επιφάνεια 
με τη χρήση του βάρους που συνδέεται με το κάρρο πέρα από μια 
τροχαλία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un carro se tira sobre la superficie plana con el
uso del peso asociado al carro sobre una polea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mögliche Energie</string>
          </keyword>
